repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:9-slim as builder
WORKDIR /openconnect
RUN apt update \
    && apt install --no-install-recommends -y \
	build-essential \
	gettext \
	autoconf \
	automake \
	libproxy-dev \
	libxml2-dev \
	libtool \
	vpnc-scripts \
	pkg-config \
	libgnutls28-dev \
	git \
    && apt-get clean \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
ADD . .
RUN ./autogen.sh
RUN ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)"
RUN make
